alert.note: Alert for Bath; Estill; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:08PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Montgomery, northern Owsley, northern Jackson, Menifee, Lee, southern Rowan, Wolfe, Powell, Morgan, southeastern Bath, Estill, northeastern Rockcastle, northwestern Breathitt and southwestern Elliott Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Coons Station to Stanton to Kerby Knob. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Jeffersonville, Hope, Walkers Crossing, Fagan, Crooks, Peeled Oak, Clay Lick, Bowen, Preston and Oggs Station around 715 PM EDT. Campsites in the Indian Creek area of the Daniel Boone National Forrest, Olympia Springs, Tabor, Sudith, Haystack, Olympia, Red River Gorge, Rothwell, Wagersville and Koomer Ridge Campground around 720 PM EDT. Frenchburg, Salt Lick, Mariba, Young Springs, Banford, Denniston, Earnestville, Ratlitt, Wild Dog and Leighton around 725 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wellington, Caryton, Yale, Ida May, Cressmont, Heidelberg, Artville, Belle Point, Zilpo, Stoll, Beattyville, Booneville, Bangor, Lower Buffalo, Enoch, Omer, Corgleton, Paragon, Proctor, Ezel, Henry, Fincastle, Woodsbend, Craney, Lone, Leisure, Tallega, New Cummer, Liberty Road, Licking River, West Liberty, Oakdale, Blairs Mills, Index, Athol, Copebranch, Lick Branch, Canyon Falls, Gordon Ford and Pomp. THIS INCLUDES Bert T. Combs Mountain Parkway between mile markers 19 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bath; Estill; Menifee; Montgomery; Powell; Rockcastle
